price: 104. Dan engkau tidak meminta imbalan apa pun kepada mereka (terhadap seruanmu itu), sebab (seruan) itu adalah pengajaran bagi seluruh alam.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
